thread.section_title: TopVintage Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van TopVintage | topvintage.net
thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: This is the second time I have ordered from Top Vintage. Both occasions have been pleasant. Alltogether, I have ordered a pair of pants, a shirt, and a dress. The measurements were accurate, and all fit well; and looked exactly like the ad pictures. Conidering the distance, all items arrived fairly quickly, between 2-3weeks. The items arrived in a lovely prsentation. I will continue to shop with top vintage. Quality clothing worth the price.
